options.1: I would like to become a ESG MEAL family Partner
options.4: I'd like to work with you

sections.heading: For
items: Enjoy good food at less price
Save time and money for your next adventure
Save the planet from excess waste

sections.heading: For
items: Discover unique cuisines and local favourites just from your phone
Save time and money for your next adventure

mainSlogan.slogan:
EAT WELL, SPEND LESS,
AND
MAKE YOUR PLANET SMILE

cheapITDescription.slogan:
We wanted to create
something unique!
cheapITDescription.sentence1: Discover a world of new flavours
cheapITDescription.sentence2: Save time and money for your next adventure
cheapITDescription.shortDescription: cheap it - a platform for delicious food at affordable prices!

mealCountDescription.message: Don't know what to eat??? Save the planet!
mealCountDescription.sentence2: Don't waste money on unnecessary calories
mealCountDescription.shortDescription: Meal Count - your own menu, right in your smartphone!

ecoMealMarketDescription.slogan:
Something that will
really change the
world!
ecoMealMarketDescription.message: Fancy something fresh??? Save the planet!
ecoMealMarketDescription.shortDescription: eco meal market - your own eco-farm in your smartphone!

WeDidIt.message: The comprehensive food optimisation system ‘Cheap-It Family’ is an innovative step towards reducing food waste!

EcoAppNetworkComponent.altEarthImg: Planet Earth surrounded by flowers and plants around the edge. Displays green forests and blue oceans.

EcoAppNetworkItems.altPhoneMealCountImg: Smartphone with the Meal Count logo displayed on the screen.
EcoAppNetworkItems.altPhoneCheapItImg: Smartphone with the Cheap It logo displayed on the screen.
EcoAppNetworkItems.altPhoneEcoMealImg: Smartphone with the Eco Meal Market logo displayed on the screen.
